name: Theatre of Evolution V2
description:
This is a remake of the Theatre of Evolution game I had made in Game Lab (also available on itch).  This was made using Unity.

This is a beta version, it is not complete and practically all art is a placeholder.  This was a major programming challenge because I've added computer players.   I want to develop this into a full indie game one day if I can get a team together.  I haven't touched this game in almost a year, but I decided to upload this version since I've put more time into this than almost any other project.
